meaning_str.bing:
n. 鸟；伯德；姑娘；人
v. 捕鸟；在野外观察识别野鸟
abbr. (=International Bank for Reconstruction and Development)(联合国)国际复兴开发银行
网络. 鸟类；小鸟；鸟儿

捕鸟；在野外观察识别野鸟
(=International Bank for Reconstruction and Development)(联合国)国际复兴开发银行

鸟；禽；家伙；空中飞行器；直升机；姑娘；（bird的复数）
捕鸟；观鸟；（bird 的第三人称单数）

1.en: The participants rejected any suggestion of trying to stop the spread of HPAI by killing wild birds.
1.cn: 与会者拒绝接受任何试图通过捕杀野鸟的办法来遏制高致病性禽流感传播的建议。

2.en: Yep, Plus the air sacs mean that birds weigh less than you'd expect, which makes flying less costly in terms of energy.
2.cn: 是的。加上肺泡的话就说明鸟比我们想象的要轻，那样飞行就不会那么耗能量。

3.en: The officers who found the birds described them as small with brown and black feathers. They were intact and had not been shot.
3.cn: 公路巡逻人员描述死掉的鸟的特征：个头小，羽毛呈棕黑相间，并且头完好无损，没有被射杀的迹象。

0.en: What kind of birds did he study?
0.cn: 他研究的是什么样的鸟？

1.en: Joe, emus are birds. You raise them for meat.
1.cn: 乔伊，鸸鸟是鸟类，是养来当食物的。

2.cn: 今天真不是鸟儿的好日子。

3.en: The mountains, the trees the birds in the trees.
3.cn: 群山树林，还有林中的小鸟。

4.en: Really? On top of everything else, you're afraid of birds?
4.cn: 不是吧？这世界那么险恶，你怕的却是小鸟？

5.en: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush? Sure, that has birds in it.
5.cn: 一鸟在手，胜过二鸟在林？当然，这话里也有鸟。

6.en: Usually we come out at night so birds don't carry us off.
6.cn: 我们晚上出来免得被鸟叼走。

7.en: You show me the left engine, I'll show you dead birds and no power.
7.cn: 你把左翼发动机找来，我就给你看死鸟和停车的痕迹。

8.en: And I don't think I'm the only one. Come on, we're birds. We're descended from dinosaurs. We're not supposed to be nice. Right?
8.cn: 我觉得不止我一只鸟，拜托，我们是鸟，我们的祖宗可是大恐龙，我们生来就不是吃素的，对吗？

9.en: Look at us! IPod, TV, pancakes? We are not people, we are birds. We have to get out to the wild and be birds, Blu. Let the kids connect their roots, show them what I had.
9.cn: 看看我们 音乐播放器 电视 煎饼。亲爱的 我们不是人类 我们可是鸟。我们应该回到野外 做真正的鸟 布鲁。让孩子们叶落归根，看看我们从前的生活。

10.en: Yeah, so? So, when they ride horses and fly on the birds, they also use their ponytails.
10.cn: 那又怎样？他们骑马或骑鸟的时候也会用到马尾辫。

11.en: What did Darwin study? Birds. There you go. Really? I got that one wrong.
11.cn: 达尔文到底研究了什么动物？鸟。答对了。真的吗？那我倒是记错了。

12.en: I can hear traffic and birds. I can hear the voices in my head again. I'm kidding.
12.cn: 我可以听到汽车跟鸟叫声，我又再度听到我脑海中的声音了。开玩笑的。

13.en: Daddy, what will we see in the countryside? We'll see birds and trees and flowers and bees. Dine-saw.
13.cn: 我们会在郊外看见什么呢？会看见鸟，树木，花朵和蜜蜂。恐龙！

14.en: No. She'd be going alone. Well, if you think I'm afraid of birds, you should see me around sheep.
14.cn: 不不不，她自己去而已，如果你们觉得我很怕鸟，那真该看看我遇到羊会怎么样？

15.en: We're getting our kids back. And I don't need any calm, detached, happy birds. Not gonna help us. Don't need it. I need some angry flocking birds.
15.cn: 我们要夺回我们的孩子，我们现在不需要什么平和，超脱，快乐的小鸟。那种鸟帮不上忙，我们不需要，我需要的是疯狂的，愤怒的小鸟。

16.en: Oh! A little bird dropped this off today. I Missed You! H. It's me, I'm the "H". Also, there's no birds. Also me.
16.cn: 哦！今天有只小鸟送来了一封信。想你！H。是我，我是"H"，也没有鸟，就是我。

17.en: Oh, you know what? I can't. I have to go spread seeds on his front lawn so he can run through birds when he gets home.
17.cn: 可惜，我去不了。我得去他家前院的草坪上撒种子，那样他回家时，可以享受从鸟群经过的感觉。

18.en: We can't let him go! What if we don't find a cave before sunset? What if it takes a few days? What if the birds come back?
18.cn: 我们不能让他走! 要是我们在日落之前找不到山洞怎么办? 要是一连几天都找不到怎么办? 那些鸟又回来了怎么办?

19.en: Yeah. Right! People eat birds. Bird meat. Now do they just fly into your mouth? Or you go in a restaurant and say: Excuse me, I'll have a bucket of fried bird. Or maybe just a wing. Or a…
19.cn: 嗯，是喔！人类会吃小鸟，小鸟肉，他们是直接飞进你的嘴里吗？ 还是你可以到餐厅说：“不好意思，我要点一份炸鸟”或是一个翅膀，或是…
